item.title: Do I Know Databases?
item.description: Greetings, this is Mainak ðŸ‘‹. And this is one of (hopefully) many posts that I am planning about my insights on various domains ranging from DSA, API Design, Tech, etc. So let’s talk about what can be expected from some of my future posts. Do I Know Databases? Well not really I don’t ðŸ™ƒ. I know that data is stored in a file, but aside from that everything is mostly a blackbox.
